title: The channels follow in order, each one being 6 MHz in bandwidth with the carrier at 1.25 MHz above the lower cut-off frequency. The total number of channels is 69 and channel 69 has a bandwidth from 800–806 with the carrier at 801.25 MHz. It should be noted that in every case the FM carrier for the audio is 4.5 MHz above the video carrier
